item.description:
http://www.pinelandtrails.com/

Pineland Farms Trail Festival features a 10K, 5K canicross (race with your dog), 5K and

Barefoot 5K

That's right and entire 5K for just those who run without shoe of any kind. No huaraches, 5 Fingers, Minimalist...bare soles only! Instead of being the one or two only barefoot runners join 50+ runners on the beautiful hilly trails of Pinelnad Farm and enjoy the music and barbeque after the race. We go up and camp at Bradbury Mountain State Park and bring the kids. This is a seriously good time and the weather looks great so far.

Â 

If you are registering for the Barefoot 5K join our team. When you go to Racewire, you have a choice of registering as an individual, join a team or create a team. I have created New England Barefoot Runners as a team so join us! You can also join the team if you sign up on site or you can add yourself the day of the race if you have already registered.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the folks with out shoes and likely wearing orange
item.name: Pineland Farms Trail Festival
